mapper.select:
SELECT a.ID, a.GROUPCODE, a.DISCLOSURECATEGORY, a.TITLE,a.CREATEDAT, a.PDFFILE AS "file", a.TERM1, a.TERM2, a.TERM3, b.CODENAME FROM DISCLOSURE a JOIN CODEDETAIL b ON a.GROUPCODE = b.GROUPCODE AND a.DISCLOSURECATEGORY = b.code
AND title LIKE '%' || #{pageRequestDTO.keyword} || '%'
ORDER BY a.ID DESC OFFSET #{pageRequestDTO.offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{pageRequestDTO.size} ROWS ONLY

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DISCLOSURE a JOIN CODEDETAIL b ON a.GROUPCODE = b.GROUPCODE AND a.DISCLOSURECATEGORY = b.code
AND title LIKE '%' || #{pageRequestDTO.keyword} || '%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DISCLOSURE (GROUPCODE, DISCLOSURECATEGORY, TITLE, PDFFILE, TERM1, TERM2, TERM3, CREATEDAT) VALUES ( #{groupCode}, #{disclosureCategory}, #{title}, #{file, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{term1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{term2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{term3, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSTIMESTAMP AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul')
